s1.title: Introduction
s1.p: Avalon has a lot of documentation (it has a lot of code, too, but most users don't see this as that much of a problem). It might be difficult for you to see where you should get started. That's why I wrote this little document.

The place you get started is what we call the avalon framework. This little bit of code (the jar file is about 60k), combined with quite a bit of documentation, will revolutionize (in time) the way you write software.
